channel.title: Members
channel.description:
I found a tut on dodian.com for members, but i got errors,
Can anyone help me as i need members features on my server, thanks :)

item.title: Members
item.dc:creator: @tedyslilnoob tedyslilnoob
item.description:
@tedyslilnoob wrote:

ok hold on let me add quickly, bb in 3 mins

client.java:17811: cannot find symbol symbol : method GetCLMembership(int) location: class client int CLMembership = GetCLMembership(wearID); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error

http://dodian.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=2900 <-- that the tut

I havenâ€™t added: public int GetCLMembership(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName.startsWith("Name")) { return 0; } else if (ItemName.contains("Name")) { return 0; } else if (ItemName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name")) { return 0; } return 0; }

Because i dont know where it goes and i get errors (100) when i add places
